EmailTemplate.name: AWARS Partner Email.2017 HELI-EXPO AWARS Partner Email
EmailTemplate.subject: AWARS Support in Every Corner of the World!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
We’re only as strong as our network! Our Authorized Warranty and Repair Stations provide local support in every corner of the world.
Honeywell’s Authorized Warranty and Repair Stations provide support to our Small Engine Fuel Systems Control business. The benefits of using our global network of licensed partners include:
- Guaranteed service including certified repair and overhaul
- Enhanced aircraft value with OEM original or authorized parts & service
- Certified fuel service MRO shops
To locate a local Authorized Warranty and Repair Station within our global network: Click Here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/HONEYWELL%20AWARS%20DIRECTORY%202017%20US%20Letter%20final.pdf]]>
For more information on Honeywell’s Authorized Warranty and Repair Stations, contact Jonathan Bellamy at Jonathan.Bellamy2@honeywell.com <[[mailto:Jonathan.Bellamy2@honeywell.com]]> or 602-333-6621.
